meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>beforehand</kanji> <kanji>promise</kanji> is a promise you've made beforehand. This is a <vocabulary>reservation</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>appointment</vocabulary>. Makes sense, right?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
